name: Quadrix
description:
Quadrix - simple puzzle game. Stacking bricks of the same color together and make matches.

Quadrix provides the field for fun and joy for amateurs and professionals
of free brick puzzle games as well. It brings new fun in the game. Beautiful bricks and unlimited gameplay are suitable for all ages plyers.


Game Rules:

Place puzzle bricks on the field.

Remove 3 or more blocks of the same color standing nearby in a line or a
row.

Clear the field from the blocks to get the place for more blocks on the
field.

Multicolored blocks allows to make multicolored chains of blocks.

Game Features:
Fancy Graphics.
World Records.
Plenty of strategies to left field clear as long as you can.

Brick puzzle games are the fastest way to improve logic and thinking
skills.
